channel.title: [667+]need help with hourly points
channel.description:
I'd like to make a system with Hourly points, for every 1 hour your logged in, you'll get a reward.
It's possible in NRS3's source but im not using that source anymore,
However i tried converting it from NRS3's to the new one i'm using, but the one i'm using has no folders for events and i tried importing them and that didn't work either.
Can i get help with this?

item.title: [667+]need help with hourly points
